mapper.select: select p.name as name, p.pcode as pcode, pt.type as type, p.startdate as startdate, p.finishdate as finishdate, t.name as team, vi.issucnt as issuecnt, vo.outputcnt as outputcnt, ps.state as pstate, rnd.state as state, p.projectseq as projectseq from tblteam t inner join tblEmployee e on t.employeeseq = e.employeeseq inner join tblProject p on p.projectseq = t.projectseq inner join tblrnd rnd on rnd.rndseq = p.rndseq inner join tblrole r on r.roleseq = t.roleseq inner join tblpState ps on ps.pstateseq = p.pstateseq inner join tblptype pt on pt.ptypeseq = p.ptypeseq left outer join vdashissue vi on t.name = vi.name left outer join voutputcount vo on t.name = vo.name where r.role='PL' order by p.projectseq
select distinct name as team from tblteam order by team
select state as pstate from tblpstate

select p.name as name, p.projectSeq as projectseq, w.name as wname, o.*, f.* from tblProject p inner join tblStage s on p.projectSeq = s.projectSeq inner join tblWork w on s.stageSeq = w.stageSeq inner join tblOutput o on w.workSeq = o.workSeq inner join tblFile f on o.outputSeq = f.outputSeq where o.oTypeSeq in (1, 2, 3, 4, 6) order by o.regdate desc, w.name asc

select p.name as name, p.projectSeq as projectseq, w.name as wname, o.*, f.* from tblProject p inner join tblStage s on p.projectSeq = s.projectSeq inner join tblWork w on s.stageSeq = w.stageSeq inner join tblOutput o on w.workSeq = o.workSeq inner join tblFile f on o.outputSeq = f.outputSeq where o.oTypeSeq in (1, 2, 3, 4, 6)
and title like '%'||#{title}||'%'
order by o.regdate desc, w.name asc

select p.name as name, p.pcode as pcode, pt.type as type, p.startdate as startdate, p.finishdate as finishdate, e.name as employeename,r.role as role, t.name as team, vi.issucnt as issuecnt, vo.outputcnt as outputcnt, ps.state as pstate, rnd.state as state, p.projectseq as projectseq from tblteam t inner join tblEmployee e on t.employeeseq = e.employeeseq inner join tblProject p on p.projectseq = t.projectseq inner join tblrnd rnd on rnd.rndseq = p.rndseq inner join tblrole r on r.roleseq = t.roleseq inner join tblpState ps on ps.pstateseq = p.pstateseq inner join tblptype pt on pt.ptypeseq = p.ptypeseq left outer join vdashissue vi on t.name = vi.name left outer join vdashoutput vo on t.name = vo.name where p.projectseq = #{projectseq} and r.role='PL'

select p.name as name, p.pcode as pcode, pt.type as type, p.startdate as startdate, p.finishdate as finishdate, e.name as employeename,r.role as role, t.name as team, vi.issucnt as issuecnt, vo.outputcnt as outputcnt, ps.state as pstate, rnd.state as state, p.projectseq as projectseq from tblteam t inner join tblEmployee e on t.employeeseq = e.employeeseq inner join tblProject p on p.projectseq = t.projectseq inner join tblrnd rnd on rnd.rndseq = p.rndseq inner join tblrole r on r.roleseq = t.roleseq inner join tblpState ps on ps.pstateseq = p.pstateseq inner join tblptype pt on pt.ptypeseq = p.ptypeseq left outer join vdashissue vi on t.name = vi.name left outer join vdashoutput vo on t.name = vo.name where p.projectseq = #{projectseq} and r.role='PMO'

select p.projectSeq as projectseq, e.name as ename, po.position as position from tblProject p inner join tblTeam t on p.projectSeq = t.projectSeq inner join tblEmployee e on t.employeeSeq = e.employeeSeq inner join tblPosition po on e.positionSeq = po.positionSeq where p.projectSeq = #{projectseq} order by decode(position, '상무', 1, '이사', 2, '부장', 3, '차장', 4, '과장', 5, '계장', 6, '대리', 7, '주임', 8, '사원', 9)
select * from tblproject where projectseq = #{projectseq}

select p.projectSeq as projectseq, e.name as ename, LISTAGG(w.name, ', ') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY w.name) as wname from tblProject p inner join tblTeam t on p.projectSeq = t.projectSeq inner join tblEmployee e on t.employeeSeq = e.employeeSeq inner join tblWork w on t.teamSeq = w.teamSeq where p.projectSeq = #{projectseq} group by e.name, p.projectSeq order by e.name asc

select issueSeq AS ISSUESEQ , title AS TITLE , workSeq AS WORKSEQ , workName AS WORKNAME , projectSeq AS PROJECTSEQ , projectName AS PROJECTNAME , TO_CHAR(regDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REGDATE , TO_CHAR(hopeDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS HOPEDATE , TO_CHAR(manageDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MANAGEDATE , content AS CONTENT , imergency AS IMERGENCY , iType AS ITYPE , iStateSeq AS ISTATESEQ , IRoleSeq AS IROLESEQ from TBLISSUE where projectSeq = #{projectseq} order by MANAGEDATE desc, IMERGENCY

select p.name as name, p.projectSeq as projectseq, w.name as wname, o.*, f.* from tblProject p inner join tblStage s on p.projectSeq = s.projectSeq inner join tblWork w on s.stageSeq = w.stageSeq inner join tblOutput o on w.workSeq = o.workSeq inner join tblFile f on o.outputSeq = f.outputSeq where o.oTypeSeq in (1, 2, 3, 4, 6) and p.projectSeq = #{projectseq} order by o.regdate desc, w.name asc
select projectseq from tblproject where projectseq = #{projectseq}

select DISTINCT p.projectseq, t.name, cd.costdiv, c.expend, c.exdate from tblcost c inner join tblcostdivision cd on cd.costdivisionseq = c.costdivisionseq inner join tblbudget b on c.budgetseq = b.budgetseq inner join tblproject p on b.projectseq = p.projectseq inner join tblteam t on p.projectseq = t.projectseq where p.projectseq = #{projectseq}
select name, projectSeq from tblProject

select p.projectSeq as projectSeq , p.name as name, w.name as wname, w.workseq as wworkseq from tblProject p inner join tblStage s on p.projectSeq = s.projectSeq inner join tblWork w on s.stageSeq = w.stageSeq

select f.fileseq as fileseq, f.title as title, p.name as name, w.name as wname, t.type as type, o.fileExplain as fileExplain, p.projectSeq as projectseq, o.outputseq as outputseq from tblProject p inner join tblStage s on p.projectSeq = s.projectSeq inner join tblWork w on s.stageSeq = w.stageSeq inner join tblOutput o on w.workSeq = o.workSeq inner join tblFile f on o.outputSeq = f.outputSeq inner join tblOType t on o.oTypeSeq = t.oTypeSeq where o.oTypeSeq in (1, 2, 3, 4, 6) and f.fileseq = #{fileseq}
mapper.insert: insert all into tblOutput(outputSeq, workSeq, oTypeSeq, issueSeq, fileExplain, regDate, version) values(outputseq.nextVal, #{workseq}, #{otypeseq}, null, #{fileexplain}, sysdate, 1) into tblFile(fileSeq, outputSeq, title) values(fileSeq.nextVal, outputseq.nextVal, #{title}) select * from dual
